PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.section1:
1. Data Collected.
This service collects only the minimum necessary information for authentication, such as your name, email address, and profile picture. No additional personal data is collected.
PrivacyPolicy.section2:
2. Use of Data.
The data is used solely to identify you and provide access to the service. The data will not be sold, shared, or used for advertising.
PrivacyPolicy.section3:
3. Data Storage and Deletion.
User data is stored only for account management purposes. You may request account deletion at any time, and your associated data will be permanently deleted.
PrivacyPolicy.section4Item1: Authentication is performed via Google OAuth and an external authentication service. The data transmitted is governed by the Google Privacy Policy and the services used for its (authentication) operation.
PrivacyPolicy.section4Item2: Text processing is performed by a third-party AI provider. Their policies apply to the content you submit for analysis.
PrivacyPolicy.section5:
5. Cookies and Local Storage.
Cookies or local storage may be used only for technical purposes, such as maintaining your session.
